name: FishMan Extermination
description:
A fishman tired of his government who has destroyed his home planet is determined to eliminate each of them using his powerful weapon and UFO vehicle to travel all over Pisces and overthrow said government.

Enjoy this voxel art adventure inspired by the game Slayaway Camp

Un Hombre pez cansado de su gobierno que ha destruido su planeta natal esta decidido a eliminar a cada uno de ellos usando su poderosa arma y su vehículo OVNI para viajar por todo Piscis y derrocar dicho gobierno

Disfruta de esta aventura voxel Art inspirada en el juego "Slayaway Camp"
